I have done C++ development starting at the undergraduate level, and continuing into work and grad school. However, I haven't ever learned all of the C++ capabilities start to finish, which I feel would be beneficial. To do this, I decided to go through the book C++ Primer Plus, doing all of the programming exercises as I went through the book.

The github repository where my solutions can be found is located at:
https://github.com/SaintNicholas/Cpp-Primer-Plus
